name: 李明哲
objective: 本課程將教授C語言相關知識，著重於程式設計的基本觀念及邏輯思考流程，不偏重於語法的死記，內容可能包含：程式基本觀念、資料種類、副程式、算術與邏輯運算、迴圈與遞迴、檔案的讀寫、加密解密的方法、陣列與指標、演算法、數值方法、正規化比對、自動化等重要觀念。
schedule:
Lec. #          Date            Contents
1               109/9/19        Environment setup, basic introduction to C
2               109/9/26        standard input/output, data type, C preprocessor, arithmetic operations
3               109/10/3        function, array & loops, Read/Write files,
4               109/10/10       2-dim array, for-loop, relational & logical operations            
5               109/10/17       if-else-if command, random number generations
6               109/10/24       other char-related built-in functions, sorting
7               109/11/7        practice constructing a prime table
8               109/11/14       Mid-term (期中考)
9               109/11/21       Discussion of Mid-term questions, Bitwise operations
10              109/11/28       practice loops & string analysis skills
11              109/11/26       command window file redirection, other programming skills
12              109/12/5        recursion
13              109/12/12       continue on recursion, array & pointers
14              109/12/19       continue on array & pointers 
15              109/12/26       Allocate memory, pointer to functions 
16              110/1/2         Allocate memory, pointer to functions
17              110/1/9         structures
18              110/1/16        Final (期末考)
scorePolicy:
上課表現 ─ 15%
小考與作業 ─ 30%
期中考 ─ 25% 
期末考 ─ 30%
materials:
參考書:
(1)The C Programming Language (by BRIAN W. KERNIGHAN & DENNIS M. RITCHIE)
(2)C 語言教學手冊 第4版 (洪維恩著)
